DOC.brief_summary: This study investigate immediate effect fascia therapy transcutaneous fibrolysis treatment acute ankle sprain . These treatment compare placebo group .
DOC.brief_title: The Effect Fascia Therapy Transcutaneous Fibrolysis Acute Ankle Sprain
DOC.detailed_description: Ankle sprain occur sport related injury . In spite high prevalence injury often residual symptom , large variety diagnostic approach therapeutic protocol . Concerning treatment acute ankle sprain , remain challenge minimize injury consequence short long term . In study investigate immediate effect two therapeutic technique : fascia therapy transcutaneous fibrolysis . They compare third group , receive placebo treatment . Muscle strength , muscle vascularisation , muscle tenderness joint position sense measure treatment . The purpose study contribute knowledge treat acute ankle sprain .
